[[*user Gayboydove]]
Hi!!! I'm dove :) Welcome to my author page!!!
You can call me: Dove/Transgirldove
Pronouns: She/they, do NOT use He/him
My interests!: SCP (duh), physics, doves and pigeons, playing video games, boys, girls, revolvers, and soup.
Timezone: EST
Favorite author on wiki: [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]
Favorite SCPs: [[[SCP-2935]]] [[[SCP-610]]] [[[SCP-5000]]]
How I discovered SCP: Way back in 2019, I was browsing youtube when I happened upon the SCP Illustrated (Now Mr Illustrated) channel. I was so enamoured with the concept of a secret anomalous organization that I had to check it out. My first few SCPs were bad, and as such they flopped. But I eventually found my footing, releasing two SCPs in early 2021 which are both still up today! After a 3 year hiatus for mental health, I am finally back and plan on writing as much as I can! Yippee!
[[/tab]]

[[tab Atlas Keyestone]]
[[include component:image-block
| name=thesilly
| caption=Ethics Liason Atlas Keyestone, woah!
]]
The main character of my current SCP wiki series, how cool! Here's some info!

Name: Atlas Keyestone
Pronouns: He/Him/His
Age: 100,452
About: A trans man from Kentucky, Atlas has faced a lot of hardship. After graduating from Harvard Law School and entering the Foundation's Ethics Committee- he lives a long, successful life, passing away from cancer at the age of 81. And then he woke up. Cursed to live in an endless cycle of lives, each starting with his first day of foundation employment and ending with his death, Atlas has lived for over a hundred thousand years. But someone else is like him. Having lost his lives long lover, Kyle Hill, to a universe where day broke, Atlas has lived in pain ever since. Will he ever wake back up under a red sun, finally able to get his partner back? Or will he try and fail to find Kyle. Forever without the man he loves. Find out, I guess.

Extant Appearances:
[[[SCP-7937]]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/i-am-weird I am Weird]
[[[SCP-8150]]]

Red sun reunion series:

Part 2: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/redsun2 Broken Dagger Under a Bleeding Sun]
